note:
Teacher and learner in a permanent process of deconstruction and figuring out.
Queer. Wondering what means exactly to be nonbinary at 50 (OK, 51 now).
Intersectional feminist, anti-racist. Police is no good. Anticapitalist, but trapped by capitalist forces.
The world needs to change, I do what I can in my square meter.

I laugh a lot.

fields.name: Assume nothing
fields.value: Black lives matter — trans rights are human rights — ACAB
